----------------------- Nemo_D.O Introduce---------------------------------

Game Description

'Nemo_D.O' is a puzzle action game base on local multi-play

Player could control the two robots equally moving for achieve the goal

This game has two modes, single play and multiplayer, each mode has a different kind of fun.

※ COMING TO  OFFICIAL VERSION RELEASE STEAM ON December 2018

1. Nemo_D.O Multi-play

The Multi play mode is running only in can have a match with maximum 2-4 people together.

each Player has to control the characters in two screens simultaneously with one controlling and each can shoot the bullets and destroy one of competitor's robots. You can shot when you have bullets and use objects which are located in stages to against enemy. You can use the objects as a trap and can destroy the enemies, decoying the competitors' robots into the traps.

In this version, you can choose one between 3 themes, the waste graveyard, the Conveyor Center and the laboratory in the tower of Noah and you can enjoy the game with your friends winning three out of five.

2. Nemo_D.O Single-play

A single-play game mode of Nemo_D.O begins with the story of the old-fashioned robot, the main character, on the pile of machinery. One day in 2133, the power supply of the robot is suddenly on, in front of blast furnace in machinery graveyard.

Then, the robot, the main character wanders the cities of robots' which are desolated by the war and he tries to find the Tower of Relja to get the last hope of human beings. 

A single-play game mode of Nemo_D.O begins with the story of the old-fashioned robot, the main character, on the pile of machinery. One day in 2133, the power supply of the robot is suddenly on, in front of blast furnace in machinery graveyard.

The main characters are two robots as you can see below.

The circle 'D.O' has bullets and it can shoot the bullets to attack the enemies.

The square 'Nemo' can push or lift the objects, using the magnetic force.

Both are originally the form of one robot, but it is disassembled into two forms only because it is so old-fashioned. In the waste graveyard with flowing iron water like lava and with piling up the machinery part like mountain, the robot, the main character's power is suddenly on right before being discarded and he tries to escape the blast furnace in the state of disassembled.

Then, the robot, the main character wanders the cities of robots' which are desolated by the war and he tries to find the Tower of Noah to get the last hope of human beings. This is the main story of this game.

Music by CursedSnake(https://soundcloud.com/cursedsnake)
